title: Please Stop Nerfing Shaco
body:
Dear Riot,

   I've been playing {{champion:35}} for a long time now because playing tricks on people is not only my favorite way of playing; it's a way of life. However, for the longest time I have been annoyed about the inconsistency of his ult (Phaco). If his lore is to create a copy of himself to use as a distraction, why is it so easy to tell the difference? Phaco can trigger on hit effects from items like {{item:3087}} and {{item:3074}}, so why is it wrong for him to to carry red and blue buff. By now most players have accepted {{champion:35}}  as a jungler, so why does Phaco discourage having buffs that are mandatory to succeed in that role? Well up until this point I have accepted these facts and just tried to be wise about using Phaco while having red or blue buff and I've managed pretty well. Now here lies the problem at hand. Junglers are  encouraged to maintain dragon control. With the new dragon buffs, {{champion:35}} has been auto-nerfed. Now if {{champion:35}}'s team has a single dragon, Phaco loses it's lore. For the rest of the game {{champion:35}} will have a reddish orange glow to him and Phaco will not, as well as an icon if you target him. Do you ever plan on making {{champion:35}} a {{champion:254}}able champion again? or is he doom to be cast aside as we move into the future of league? This argument is meant to include {{champion:62}} and {{champion:7}} and mostly concerns the fact that dragon never goes away.

replies.body:
Shaco's not getting any huge buffs until he loses his rather absurd blink/stealth on a single button. 

It would't surprise me if Shaco's just up for a rework. Of all the stealth mechanics in the game, Shaco's is among the most obnoxious.

Shaco's ability to spam his blink/stealth is very annoying, though Shaco isn't really that scary early game besides his ability to counterjungle extremely well. Shaco just doesn't have too much damage early game, he's squishy and seemingly relies entirely on his boxes for even jungling until mid - late game.

Shaco does become a major threat mid - late game to any squishy people when he has items built up, being able to spam stealth + E makes it really difficult to fight him especially with his ultimate.

He's obnoxious, I would know I played him a lot but usually AD Shaco can be shutdown early - mid game most of the time if played right. Shaco Mains are really scary though because they'll always end up using their passive against you and know how to gank the best.
